meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Timothy Mahoney Denese Edsall Dana Greenblatt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #3982.

div.div: Champion's winnings matched to the Families of Freedom Scholarship Fund ($10,000 minimum).

td.p: Timothy Mahoney, a development officer originally from Detroit, Michigan
Denese Edsall, an equal opportunity manager from Hollywood, Florida
Dana Greenblatt, a graduate student originally from Toledo, Ohio (whose 2-day cash winnings total $36,401)

tr.td: FIRST THINGS FIRST
U.S. CITIES
THAT'S WHAT MAKES HORSE RACES
TAKING THE BAR EXAM
"B" ON THE LOOKOUT
CHRISTMAS RAPPINGS

div.onmouseover:

(Timothy: What is [*]?)
[Applause from Dana and Denese]
(Alex: It is wine. It\'s rice wine, of course, but we wanted you to differentiate it from the other grape wine.)

sake

Timothy
')

toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
DeneseWhat are pine trees?

nutmeg')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'The Dutch traded New York to the British for a tiny island producing this, now mainly used at Christmastime')

tr.td: COLONIAL TRADE
The Dutch traded New York to the British for a tiny island producing this, now mainly used at Christmastime
Dana
Denese
Timothy
2nd place: trip to Ireland + a subscription to The New York Times
3rd place: trip to Hard Rock Hotel in Las Vegas + a subscription to The New York Times
New champion: $15,000
Dana
Denese
Timothy

15 R,
4 W
(including 2 DDs)

9 R
(including 1 DD),
1 W
